se:Description.se:Title: geologic unit lithology: Geologic Unit Lithology Default Style
se:Description.se:Abstract: The colours and RGB codes for lithology, developed for the OneGeology-Europe project, with the addition of styles for anthropogenic consolidated and unconsolidated material, loss of core, cavity and soil, undifferentiated material are includedin the colour tables below.
